name: Bobby Gillespie
description:
'''Robert Gillespie''' ({{IPAc-en|ɡ|ᵻ|ˈ|l|ɛ|s|p|i}} {{respell|ghil|ESP|ee}}; born 22 June 1961) is a Scottish musician, singer-songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist. He is the lead singer, founding member, primary lyricist, and sole continuous member of the [[alternative rock]] band [[Primal Scream]]. He was the drummer for [[The Jesus and Mary Chain]] in the mid-1980s, leaving after the release of the band's debut album ''[[Psychocandy]]'', and was once the bassist for [[The Wake (UK band)|The Wake]].

In October 2021, Gillespie published his memoir ''Tenement Kid''.
